meanings.definition: A unit of power equal to one million watts.
meanings.sent1: The solar panels generate one megawatt of electricity per hour.
meanings.sent2: The wind turbine produces one megawatt of energy every second.
meanings.sent3: It would take a megawatt of effort to lift that heavy rock!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room with the brightness of a megawatt bulb.
meanings.sent5: The thunder roared with the power of a megawatt, shaking the windows.

meanings.definition: A unit of power equal to one million joules per second.
meanings.sent1: The hydroelectric dam generates a megawatt of power every minute.
meanings.sent2: The nuclear reactor produces one megawatt of electricity in an instant.
meanings.sent3: Trying to carry all those books felt like lifting a megawatt of weight!
meanings.sent4: His voice boomed across the stadium with the force of a megawatt explosion.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall cascaded down with the force of a megawatt, creating a mesmerizing sight.
